## Manchester Tech Cluster

Manchester Tech Cluster refers to manchester's thriving technology ecosystem centred on mediacityuk, including ai, digital innovation, and financial technology sectors.

- [[North England Innovation Corridor]]
- [[Northern Powerhouse]]
- [[UK Tech Ecosystem]]
